result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ramone J Locke in court.  Attorney Michael F. Hart in court for Ramone J Locke.  Attorney Patrick T. Franken in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Scheduling conference.  Defense requests jury trial and final pretrial dates be set.  Case to be heard with Co-Defendant case 22CF1246.  Court sets the deadline of 1/30/2023 for filing of Jury Instructions, Motions in Limine, Witness lists and Change of Plea forms.  Court Orders State to provide crime lab report prior to final pretrial hearing.  Matter adjourned to Br. 9.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 9, 2023 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for February 27, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Ramone J. Locke in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael F. Hart in court for Raymond J. Locke.  Attorney Patrick T. Franken in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Pretrial Conference  Defense has received discovery and an offer from the State. Case to tag along with Co-Defendant case.  Case adjourned to Br. 9. Scheduling conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Court down on 8/26/2022.  Pursuant to agreement of counsel, the Pre-trial Conference set for 8/26/2022 at 2 pm is rescheduled to 8/30/2022 at 2 pm.

Defendant Ramone J Locke in court with attorney Michael F. Hart.  Defendant Ramone J Locke in custody.  Patricia Irene Daugherty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ramone J Locke appeared by video means with Attorney.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Court sets 07/08/2022 as the deadline for all discovery with the exception of crime lab reports to be turned over to defense. Court sets 08/22/2022 as the deadline for filing any motions or change of plea forms.  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that effective 7/30/22, this case is assigned to branch 9, Judge Paul Van Grunsven in room 632 of the Courthouse.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Michael F. Hart in court, defendant Ramone J Locke not in court, in custody, appearance not arranged.  Amy E Spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case is adjourned in Branch 17.  Arraignment scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Ramone J Locke in court with attorney Michael F. Hart.  Defendant Ramone J Locke in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer W. Schlicke.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Defense request an arrignment date. Court ordered case is adjourned to Branch 17.  Arraignment scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Michael F. Hart in court by video, defendant Ramone J Locke not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. This is a co-def matter. Defense requests an adjournment of this matter to allow the case of the co-defendant (22CF1246) to make an initial appearance and join this matter. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Michael F. Hart in court, defendant Ramone J Locke not in court, in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for Preliminary hearing. State's witness is unavailable. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Ramone J Locke in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Ramone J Locke in custody.  Sara Waldschmidt-DeSmet appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ramone J Locke appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
